title: Exclusive: Zelensky says world should be prepared for possibility Putin could use nuclear weapons - CNN
content:
1. Exclusive: Zelensky says world should be prepared for possibility Putin could use nuclear weapons  CNN
  2. Zelenskyy says world should 'be ready' for possibility Putin uses nuclear weapons  Fox News
  3. Zelensky: World should be 'worried' about potential of Russian nuclear strike  Yahoo News
  4. Ret. general discusses CIA chief's warning about nuclear weapons  CNN
  5. CIA director: Putin could get desperate enough to nuke Ukraine  Business Insider
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky told CNN Friday that "all of the countries of the world" should be prepared for the possibility that Russian President Vladimir Putin could use tactical nuclear weapons in his war on Ukraine.
